link.synopsis: Get set to guffaw with this collection of uncensored episodes from the 1980s sketch comedy series "Bizarre" -- the show that introduced the world to hapless stuntman Super Dave Osborne (the alter ego of series co-creator Bob Einstein). Funnyman John Byner serves as host for the program, which features surreal humor and regular cast members Billy Barty and Saul Rubinek. Guest stars include Howie Mandel, Pat Morita and Dick Van Dyke.

The Outer Limits: The New Series: Time Travel and Infinity
Demon Under Glass / How to Slay a Vampire

The Best of So Graham Norton

link.synopsis: It's nonstop gags, pranks and bawdiness in this compilation of 10 uncensored episodes from the 1980s sketch comedy series "Bizarre" -- the program that introduced the world to hapless daredevil Super Dave Osborne (aka Bob Einstein). Comedian John Byner acts as host for the show, which features surreal humor and regular cast members Billy Van, Luba Goy and Saul Rubinek. Guest stars include Redd Foxx, Pat Morita and stunt man Dar Rubinson.
link.title: synopsis
The Pat Paulsen Half a Comedy Hour
The Happy Hooker Goes to Washington / The Happy Hooker Goes Hollywood

Saturday Night Live: The Best of Eddie Murphy

link.synopsis: With her heart set on playing an angel in her church's annual procession, young Monica (Genevieve Buechner) "borrows" a set of costume wings and tries to blend into the cast. But her plans are thwarted when the wings end up in the hands of a homeless woman (Clare Coulter) who believes she's the Virgin Mary. Director Terrance Odette also penned the screenplay for this smart and heartwarming comedy, his second feature film.
link.title: synopsis
The Legend of the Three Trees
The Dot ... and More Stories to Make You Feel Good
Jacob's Ladder: Vol. 2: Naomi, Ruth and Boaz
Adventures in Odyssey: In Harm's Way

The Last Chance Detectives: Mystery Lights
Pirates Who Don't Do Anything: A VeggieTales Movie
Adventures in Odyssey: Race to Freedom
The King: The Story of King David

link.synopsis: Comedy legends converge in this live performance headlined by two of the genre's finest. Groucho Marx discusses his career and lobs questions at the audience and finds the funny in their responses, all while smoking his cigar. Redd Foxx pushes the envelope as he pokes fun at poverty, slavery and ... dwarves. The result: an unforgettable evening that proves why the two are considered some of the biggest funnymen ever to hit the stage and screen.
link.title: synopsis
Marx Brothers: Marx Brothers Mixed Nuts
Groucho Marx: You Bet Your Life: The Lost Episodes
Make 'Em Laugh: The Funny Business of America
Robin Harris: Live from the Comedy Act Theater
Why We Laugh: Black Comedians on Black Comedy
Check and Double Check with Amos 'n' Andy
Rodney Dangerfield: No Respect: The Ultimate Collection
Dane Cook: Rough Around the Edges: Live from Madison Square Garden

Suzanne Westenhoefer: A Bottom on Top
TK Kirkland: Are There Any Questions?
Karen Williams: I Need a Snack
Tess: Looking for My Next Ex-Husband

link.synopsis: Comedy legend Dick Van Dyke wasn't always a star, but this collection of early television appearances makes it clear that the talented actor was destined to make people laugh. Before breakout roles in several hit films and his popular TV show, Van Dyke was known as a genius on the variety show circuit. This compilation from "The Pat Boone-Chevy Showroom" features monologues that eventually became some of the comedian's best-known routines.
link.title: synopsis
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
Shirley Temple: The Biggest Little Star
Mitzi Gaynor: Razzle Dazzle! The Special Years

Beat Route: Around the World with Jools Holland

title.regular: Dick Van Dyke: In Rare Form
title.short: Dick Van Dyke: In Rare Form

link.synopsis: Has-been hip-hop stars rally to make a comeback in this R&B-infused urban comedy from director Billy Wright, the story of a once-successful crew of performers and their bid to get back on top. The only chance the Dub Ridaz have at getting back in the headlines is to pull off an outrageous publicity stunt so they can promote their latest album. But do they still have what it takes to be No. 1?
link.title: synopsis
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Keepin' the Faith: Lookin' for Mr. Right
Love and Other Four Letter Words
The Life and Hard Times of Guy Terrifico
Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
Glick Doesn't Do Red Carpet: Jiminy Glick at the Independent Spirit Awards
Tenacious D in: The Pick of Destiny

link.synopsis: Devastated after his longtime girlfriend, Mallory (Josie Maran), dumps him, Charlie (Steven Roy) refuses to let go. Things only go from bad to worse when he sees Mallory with her new boyfriend, Curtis (Scott Hanks). Plotting to sabotage their relationship, Charlie befriends Curtis and works to drive a wedge between the new lovebirds. Sean Marble, Victoria Pratt and Clare Kramer co-star in this independent comedy directed by Dustin Guy.
link.title: synopsis
5 Dolls for an August Moon / Four Times That Night
Rey Mysterio: The Biggest Little Man
Godzilla & Mothra: Battle for Earth / Vs. King Ghidora
Journey to the Center of the Earth
Diary of a Mad Black Woman: The Play

link.synopsis: Filmmaker Brad Patterson uses humor to help dispel stereotypes of the homeless in this collection of comedy sketches performed by the real people who live on Vancouver's streets. Skits include "Homeless Makeover," "Shopping Cart Races," "Crack Park Dance-Off," "Homeless Boy Band," "Homeless Gone Crazy," "Homeless Ballet" and "Homeless Olympics."
link.title: synopsis
An Orphan on the Streets / The Watch
Beijing 2008: The Games of the XXIX Olympiad
Rod Steele 0014: You Only Live Until You Die
Film Crew: Wild Women of Wongo
You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Chesterfield Kings: Where is the Chesterfield King?

link.synopsis: In the gritty drama Paradise in Harlem, a comedian's dreams of a dramatic acting career are dashed when he witnesses a mob murder and has to leave town. Burlesque in Harlem features an all-black vaudeville revue jam-packed with songs, dance and comedy. Frank H. Wilson, Mamie Smith, Norman Astwood, Edna Mae Harris, Dewey "Pigmeat" Markham, Dick Barrow, Hucklebuck Jones and Jo Jo Adams star in this pair of African-American classics set in Harlem.
link.title: synopsis
Juke Joint / Reet, Petite and Gone
Where's My Man, To-Nite? / Mystery in Swing
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Snow Flower and the Secret Fan

Wildcat Trooper / Code of the Mounted
That Wonderful Urge / Love Is News
I Met Him in Paris / Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
The Three Stooges: Three Stooges in History
The Lives of a Bengal Lancer

title.regular: Paradise in Harlem / Burlesque in Harlem
title.short: Paradise in Harlem / Burlesque in Harlem

link.synopsis: When he reaches heaven, deceased playboy Maxwell Bard (Emlyn Williams) is granted one last wish. He has letters sent to three of his buddies (Howard Da Silva, Shepperd Strudwick and Robert Karnes) claiming that he had affairs with their wives (Eve Arden, Ruth Warrick and Vanessa Brown). While the men go crazy trying to determine the truth, Bard watches the chaos from above. This classic comedy was inspired by the 1949 hit Letter to Three Wives.
link.title: synopsis
The Life of Riley / Our Miss Brooks
King of the Wild: The Complete Serial
Gaumont Treasures: The Films of Alice Guy
The Mighty Saturns: Saturn I and IB
When Willie Comes Marching Home / Up the River
The Man Who Came to Dinner

link.synopsis: Wooster Carneal (Mitchell Rad) always does the right thing. But when he loses his wife, his job and his home, a desperate Wooster is extorted into harvesting human organs for the black market. While hunting down his unsuspecting victims, he also takes revenge on those who ruined his life. But to save himself, Wooster must stay three steps ahead of police and the organ brokers. Banning Lary directs this "mildly erotic comedy horror thriller."
link.title: synopsis
Zombies / The Blood Seekers / Blood Stalkers
Blood Feast 2: All U Can Eat

link.synopsis: Often called the Weird Al Yankovic of country music, Cledus T. Judd is known for his hilarious parodies of country tunes as well as his original comedy songs. With hits such as "Coronary Life," "the first redneck on the Internet" brings his double-wide humor to this collection of videos from his first four albums. More titles include "If Shania Was Mine," "Wives Do It All the Time," "Stinkin' Problem" and "Did I Shave My Back for This?"
link.title: synopsis
Grand Ole Opry at Carnegie Hall
Weird Al Yankovic: The Ultimate Video Collection
Outlaw Country: Live from Austin TX
The Big Picture: TV's Legendary Military Series
Man with a Camera: Complete Collection
Grateful Dead: View from the Vault 4
Alien Nation: Body and Soul / Millennium
The True Story of WrestleMania: Vol. 1
Lyle Lovett: Best of Lyle Lovett Live
Robert Earl Keen: Live at the Ryman
Aimee Mayo: This One's for the Girls
Songs for Tsunami Relief: Austin to South Asia
The Hellecasters: Live... Raw... in Germany
Shania Twain: Up Close and Personal
Dixie Chicks: Top of the World
George Strait: For the Last Time: Live from the Astrodome
Shania Twain: Up! Live in Chicago
Buddy Jewell: Help Pour Out the Rain
Randy Travis Live: It Was Just a Matter of Time
Cory Morrow: Live from Austin TX
The PovertyNeck Hillbillies: Mr. Right Now: Making the Video

title.regular: Cledus T. Judd: The Essenshul Video Collection
title.short: Cledus T. Judd: Essenshul Video Collection

link.synopsis: With their group project -- a paper on creating a utopian society -- due the next day, six college students from diverse backgrounds who can't stand one another must learn to work together. In the spirit of The Breakfast Club, the kids argue, share secrets and finally start seeing beyond stereotypes. Austin Nichols, Kelvin Yu, Kristen Ariza, Malin Akerman, Mat Hostetler and Sam Doumit star in this thought-provoking comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Life as We Know It: The Complete Series

link.synopsis: Handsome metrosexual and successful architect Michal (Maciej Zakoscielny) enjoys his bachelor lifestyle and his affair with his lovely colleague Agata (Agnieszka Dygant). But when adorable little Michalina (Julia Wróblewska) taps on the door of his luxury apartment and claims to be his daughter, Michal is taken on an adventure that will change him forever. Angnieszka Grochowska also stars in this romantic comedy directed by Ryszard Zatorski.
link.title: synopsis
In Heaven as it is on Earth

link.synopsis: Determined to stay on the straight and narrow, parolees Barry (Sam Worthington) and Spit (David Wenham) get restaurant jobs -- where they end up tangling with local gangster Chicka (Gary Sweet). Barry and Spit's employer (Timothy Spall) is also a reformed ex-con, and together, the three conspire to bring down the crime boss. This much-nominated Australian comedy also stars Freya Stafford and Steven Tandy.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Single mom Claire Vin Blanc (Anita Morris) -- an ex-hoofer with Sonny and Cher -- struggles to retain custody of her daughter (Blair Tefkin) when child welfare warns Claire to create a more stable home life. As she tries to transform herself into a model mother and homemaker, her search for a spouse leads to encounters with a janitor, a burly photographer and a religious zealot. Rick Overton and Cynthia Szigeti also star in this offbeat comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Michael Jackson: Life of a Superstar
The Boys and Girls Guide to Getting Down

link.synopsis: Middle-aged bus driver Stan Butler (Reg Varney) still lives with his overbearing, bingo-playing mother and his layabout sister and brother-in-law. When he's not trying to maintain his sanity at home, Stan is under the thumb of the meticulous Inspector Blake, who seems determined to bounce Stan out of his job. Bob Grant, Anna Karen, Michael Robbins and Stephen Lewis co-star in this hilarious show from the golden age of BBC comedy.
link.title: synopsis
On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection: Disc 1
On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection: Disc 2
On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection: Disc 3
On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection: Disc 4
On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection: Disc 5
On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection: Disc 6
On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection: Disc 7

One Day at a Time: Season 1
Chico and the Man: TV Favorites
My Favorite Martian: Time Travelers Favorites
The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin: The Complete Series

title.regular: On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection
title.short: On the Buses: The Ultimate Collection

link.synopsis: A little luckier than your average teen, Rome has it all: looks, charm and no real worries -- or so he thought. When his best friend asks him to baby-sit his little sister, Rome thinks it's a simple enough job. But that's before he discovers that the young girl has an enormous crush on him! Hip-hop sensation Lil' Romeo stars in this hilarious family comedy directed by Master P.
link.title: synopsis
Big Girls Don't Cry ... They Get Even
And You Thought Your Parents Were Weird
Wallace & Gromit: A Matter of Loaf and Death
Roxy Hunter and the Myth of the Mermaid
Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit

link.synopsis: Three charming, semiautobiographical vignettes from director Nanni Moretti offer a humorous and sardonic look at life in Italy. Playing himself, Moretti takes Rome by scooter, motoring from one end to the next, suffers a hilarious medical "crisis" and finally, leaves for a remote island to finish his film in peace. Critically acclaimed, this wistful comedy also stars Jennifer Beals, Alexandre Rockwell and Renato Carpentieri.
link.title: synopsis
Adored: Diary of a Porn Star

link.synopsis: As he approaches the dreaded age of 30, James Sanchez (James Vasquez) -- an out-of-work actor with thinning hair, a growing stack of bills and, worst of all, no boyfriend -- is beginning to believe that life has passed him by. This engaging indie comedy chronicles a year in the life of the perpetual odd-man-out as he tries to find his niche with help from his two best friends, Roxy (Nicole Marcks) and Brandon (David McBean).
link.title: synopsis
Better Sex Through Yoga: For Gay Men
The Young, the Gay and the Restless
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
Crazy Richard & I Can't Even Think Straight

link.synopsis: Teen sensation Amanda Bynes stars as Holly Tyler, a free-spirited 16-year-old who moves into her sister Valerie's (Jennie Garth) New York digs and proceeds to turn the straitlaced 28-year-old's life upside down. With Holly's impulsiveness and Valerie's practicality, cohabitating may be trying, but ultimately, they always care for each other with strong doses of sisterly love. The comedy series also stars Simon Rex and Wesley Jonathan.
link.title: synopsis
What I Like About You: Season 1: Disc 1
What I Like About You: Season 1: Disc 2
What I Like About You: Season 1: Disc 3
10 Things I Hate About You: Vol. 1
The Secret Life of the American Teenager
The Funny Blokes of British Comedy
The Vicar of Dibley: 10th Anniversary Specials
The Funny World of Lucy: Vol. 2
The Thin Blue Line: The Complete Lineup
As Time Goes By: You Must Remember This
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers

link.synopsis: It seems like every girl in Brooklyn has turned Jaime down, so he decides to enroll in college to hook up with some sexy coeds. A fish out of water at his Midwest school, he joins his fellow losers to create a new fraternity, Alpha Cinco de Mayo Delta, and finds out what it's like to be big man on campus. Juan Perez stars in this hilarious comedy that proves you're always cool enough to party somewhere.
link.title: synopsis
5 Dolls for an August Moon / Four Times That Night
How the Garcia Girls Spent Their Summer
Gabrielle Reece: The Complete Fit & Healthy Pregnancy Workout
Yucko the Clown: The Damn Show
Warts & All: The Films of Danny Plotnick
Glick Doesn't Do Red Carpet: Jiminy Glick at the Independent Spirit Awards
Dave Barry's Complete Guide to Guys

link.synopsis: Celebrity's bloated importance in contemporary culture is the theme linking the trio of vignettes in this offbeat comedy. First, a surly tennis superstar (Peter Friedrich) loses lucrative endorsement deals when a French gazette prints an exposé claiming he's gay. Next up is the story of a rich but no-talent dilettante (Amy Davis) striving for fame, followed by a tale about a geeky animal lover (Victor Fischbarg) who channels Elwood P. Dowd.
link.title: synopsis
Chris & John to the Rescue: Season 2
Tales of the Gold Monkey: The Complete Series
Love and Death on Long Island

link.synopsis: A man unable to remember his past falls for a billionaire's daughter, and the two of them decide to run off together. Naturally, the woman's father isn't happy about the situation and hires a private eye to track them down. But things get really sticky for the couple when they cross paths with a dangerous gangster. As the hapless lovebirds' problems grow bigger, so do the laughs in this screwball comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Doctor Takes a Wife / A Night to Remember
Rhythm on the Range / Rhythm on the River: Double Feature
That Wonderful Urge / Love Is News
The Killer that Stalked New York / Two of a Kind
Dead Men Tell/ Charlie Chan in Rio
The Trail of the Lonesome Pine
You Can't Take It with You

link.synopsis: After serving a two-year stretch in the slammer, thief Shyam Singh (Bobby Deol) returns to his secret hiding place to retrieve a priceless stolen diamond, only to discover that the site has become a police precinct. To gain entry, Shyam masquerades as a cop but soon arouses the suspicions of a fellow officer (Om Puri). Director David Dhawan's action comedy also stars Bipasha Basu, Paresh Rawal and Shilpa Shetty.
link.title: synopsis
Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta

link.synopsis: Well-heeled hotel owner K.K. Singhania (Kader Khan) keeps a tight grip on his establishment but has trouble reining in his spoiled daughter, Kiran (Raveena Tandon), who's in love with boxer Rahul Sinha (Mohnish Behl) -- a man K.K. finds unacceptable. To get him to change his mind about Rahul, Kiran feigns a romance with her father's business rival (Govinda) in this entertaining comedy directed by Harmesh Malhotra.
link.title: synopsis
Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Knock Knock I Am Looking to Marry

link.synopsis: As part of a scheme to abduct Mahalaxmi (Laya), the foster daughter of big-shot real estate agent Gajapathi (Tanikella Bharani), two-bit crooks Tata (Sivaji) and Birla (Krishna Bhagawan) land jobs in the realtor's household. But when Gajapathi- -- who's after Mahalaxmi's soon-to-be-inherited fortune himself -- asks the duo to bump her off, will they have a change of heart? Helmed by Srinivasa Reddy, this Bollywood comedy also stars Ashok Kumar.
link.title: synopsis
Sree Seetha Ramula Kalyanam Chutamu Raarandi

link.synopsis: As Geronimo (Enrico Fissore) works tirelessly to arrange advantageous marriages for his two daughters (Valeria Baiano and Antonella Bandelli), he's unaware that one of them has already found a mate (Roberto Coviello). Francis Travis conducts the Orchestra della Svizzera Italiana in this production of Domenico Cimarosa's "Il matrimonio segreto," an opera buffa partly based on the English comedy "The Clandestine Marriage."
link.title: synopsis
Voice of Firestone: Robert Merrill: In Opera and Song
Gaumont Treasures: The Films of Louis Feuillade
Natalie Dessay: Greatest Moments on Stage
Georges Bizet: Les Pecheurs De Perles
Anna Netrebko: Mozart: Le Nozze di Figaro
Cook, Dixon & Young: In Concert: Vol. 1
La Traviata: Love & Sacrifice: The Story of the Opera
Opera Australia: Celebration: 40 Years Of Australian Opera
Henze: L'Upupa Und Der Triumph Der Sohnesliebe
Reopening Gala of the Teatro La Fenice
Renee Fleming and Bryn Terfel: Under the Stars

link.synopsis: After winning the hand of Count Bertram (Ian Charleson) as a reward for saving the life of the King of France (Donald Sinden), lowborn commoner Helena (Angela Down) is forced to resort to trickery to keep aristocratic new husband. Celia Johnson and Pippa Guard also star in this 1981 TV adaptation of William Shakespeare's classic comedy of airs, originally broadcast as part of a BBC series showcasing the legendary dramatist's complete works.
link.title: synopsis
Shakespeare Comedies: As You Like It
Shakespeare Comedies: The Taming of the Shrew
Shakespeare Comedies: A Midsummer Night's Dream
The Rainbow / The Widowing of Mrs. Holroyd

link.synopsis: Richard Griffiths and Academy Award winner Ben Kingsley star in this BBC production of Shakespeare's comedy about Sir John Falstaff, one of Queen Elizabeth I's favorite Shakespearean characters. Hoping to strike it rich, Falstaff tries to seduce two wealthy wives of Windsor, but the ladies are wise to his scheme. Practical jokes abound and proper Elizabethan code goes out the door as a desperate Falstaff resorts to dressing in drag.
link.title: synopsis
Shakespeare Comedies: As You Like It
Shakespeare Comedies: The Taming of the Shrew
Shakespeare Comedies: A Midsummer Night's Dream
An Ideal Husband / Lady Windermere's Fan

link.synopsis: Alec McCowen, Trevor Peacock and Felicity Kendal star in this BBC production of Shakespeare's romantic comedy about Viola, a shipwrecked girl who disguises herself as a male servant and falls in love with Duke Orsino of Illyria, who is courting someone else. The odds are against Viola winning Orsino's heart, and things go from bad to worse thanks to Viola's twin brother, a confused countess, a drunkard and a ridiculous knight.
link.title: synopsis
Shakespeare Comedies: As You Like It
Shakespeare Comedies: A Midsummer Night's Dream
Mr. Palfrey of Westminster: The Complete Series

link.synopsis: Robert Stephens, Jeremy Kemp and Anna Calder-Marshall star in this BBC production of Shakespeare's romance about Sicilian King Leontes, who wrongfully accuses his wife of adultery. Sixteen years later, Leontes gets a second chance at happiness when he meets Perdita, a shepherd girl of mysterious lineage. Part drama, part comedy, this romantic tale ends with a little magic and a very real engagement. Debbie Farrington also stars.
link.title: synopsis
The Country Wife / Blue Remembered Hills
Shakespeare Comedies: As You Like It
The Shadow of the Tower: The Rise of the Tudor Dynasty
Shakespeare Comedies: The Taming of the Shrew
The Rainbow / The Widowing of Mrs. Holroyd

link.synopsis: Awakening after 20 years in a coma that resulted from a break-dancing accident, Justin Schumacher (Jamie Kennedy) discovers that his parents have enormous medical bills -- and he tries to save the day by entering himself and his friends in a dance competition. But standing in the way is a longtime foe … who's engaged to Justin's dream girl. Michael Rosenbaum and Maria Menounos also star in this 2007 comedy from director Harvey Glazer.
link.title: synopsis
The Dukes of Hazzard: The Beginning
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
How Much Do You Love Me?

link.synopsis: The romantically inexperienced Tim (Khan Chittenden) finds himself caught between a controlling mother and his new girlfriend in this emotional coming-of-age film. Jean (Brenda Blethyn), a struggling comedienne, can't accept that her son is growing up and fears that his budding relationship with Jill will disrupt the family. The conflict comes as Jean tries to revive her comedy career, and Tim's dad relives his glory days as a one-hit wonder.
link.title: synopsis
The Boys and Girl from County Clare
My Brother Is an Only Child

link.synopsis: After traveling 400 years to fulfill his dream of building a castle, samurai lord Ondaiji finds himself in a country town inhabited by eccentrics who advise him that his castle would be best made of cardboard. But why? As the townspeople set out to help Ondaiji build, will the secret they hold be revealed? Yo Kohatsu directs this festival-winning comedy starring Makoto Imazato, Yuko Nishimaru and Shuzo Mitamura.
link.title: synopsis
Revenge of the Creature / The Creature Walks Among Us
Agatha Christie's Tommy & Tuppence: Partners in Crime
When the Last Sword Is Drawn
Aragami: The Raging God of Battle
Lone Wolf and Cub: White Heaven in Hell
Zatoichi: Vol. 6: Zatoichi and the Chest of Gold
Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart in Peril
Zatoichi: Vol. 2: The Tale of Zatoichi Continues
Zatoichi: Vol. 12: Zatoichi and the Chess Expert

link.synopsis: Matt Lucas and David Walliams bring their British TV series to the stage for this live performance featuring their best comedy sketches. The duo hit it big with a revolving cast of quirky characters that skewer English class distinctions. This show features all their popular roles and entertaining catchphrases. Highlights include perennially underemployed actor Dennis Waterman and Daffyd Thomas, who thinks he's the world's only gay man.
link.title: synopsis
French & Saunders: Back with a Vengeance
Monty Python's Flying Circus: John Cleese's Personal Best
Knowing Me Knowing You with Alan Partridge: The Complete Series
The Life and Times of Vivienne Vyle
French & Saunders: Gentlemen Prefer French & Saunders
Peter Cook & Dudley Moore: The Best of... What's Left of... Not Only... But Also...
The Best of So Graham Norton
The Dame Edna Experience: The Christmas Specials
French & Saunders: Living in a Material World
The Funny Blokes of British Comedy

link.synopsis: Philip (Staten Eliot) and Casper (Francisco Labbe) share a flat in East London and spend most of their time and energy on womanizing. They always flip a coin to decide important issues, especially when it comes to the ladies. But when they meet French beauty Marie (Eglantine Rembauville-Nicolle), they both fall in love, and their lives change in unexpected ways. A hit on the independent film circuit, this hip comedy co-stars Cathy Barry.
link.title: synopsis
See No Evil: The Story of the Moors Murders
I Love You, Don't Touch Me
Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human

link.synopsis: No subject is safe from ridicule in this bold Mexican comedy series, which features hilarious parodies of politicians, famous personalities, newscasts, TV shows, sports and more. The show's talented ensemble cast includes Angélica Vale, Arath de la Torre, Freddy Ortega, German Ortega and Luis Ernesto Cano. Extras include bonus footage, a making-of documentary and other featurettes, a music video and a photo gallery.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In this wild comedy, a couple of no-good twin brothers from the streets of South Central Los Angeles turn to a gangsta for help when their mother needs medicine for a rare foot condition. In desperate need of cash, the twins and their associate try to pull off a moneymaking scheme before Mama's foot is amputated. But the plan goes belly-up, and the brothers wind up on their own in a race against the clock. TaettaChip and Tyrell Ellis star.
link.title: synopsis
My Big Phat Hip Hop Family
Keepin' the Faith: Lookin' for Mr. Right
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
You Don't Mess with the Zohan
I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
Lost Reality 2: More of the Worst
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
Bikini Girls from the Lost Planet

link.synopsis: Rajaraman (Kamal Hassan) is a strong-arm thug whose parents believe that he's a doctor. While visiting his son, Rajaraman's father meets with an old friend, the dean of the medical college, and discovers the truth about Rajaraman. Feeling guilty for the shame he's caused his parents, Rajaraman enrolls in medical school. But can this hard-nosed gangster adjust to college life? Saran directs this remake of the Hindi comedy Munnabhai M.B.B.S.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Playing matchmaker, buddies Bunny (Misty Orman) and Steve (John M. Davis) plan a weekend camping trip to allow Tammy (Tiffany Black) and Trevor (Jeremy Schwab) to get to know each other. But when radioactive meteorites rain down on a nearby cemetery, the dead rise from their graves -- becoming flesh-eating zombies who think the four friends look like a very tasty treat. This campy horror comedy co-stars Alecia Peterman and Cheryl Dallas.
link.title: synopsis
Zombie Jamboree: The 25th Anniversary of Night of the Living Dead
Zombies of Mora Tau / The Werewolf
Mulva: Zombie Ass Kicker! / Filthy McNasty
Masters of Horror: Tobe Hooper: Dance of the Dead
Death Valley: The Revenge of Bloody Bill
Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
Masters of Horror: Lucky McKee: Sick Girl

link.synopsis: Pressured by his grandparents to marry, Gopi (Srikanth) signs up with a marriage broker and chooses three young women, arranging to meet each of them to find a compatible match. But he faces a dilemma when all three -- journalist Savitri (Anitha), dancer Bhavana (Laya) and bank employee Neha (Vidya) -- fall in love with him. Sangeeta co-stars as marriage broker Priya in this Indian comedy directed by Venky.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Though he's successful in his career composing commercial jingles, homely Sundaram (Rajendra Prasad) can't get a date. His solution? Learn black magic to attract &NFi;mohini pisachis&NFi_; -- sexually voracious female ghosts that wander at night in search of available men. But when he meets Ramya (Damini), everything changes. Directed by Pendyala Venkata Rama Rao, this Indian comedy co-stars Bhavana, Harika, Sudha and Chandra Mohan.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: Adapted from Anthony Winters's hit play, this sidesplitting urban comedy follows the struggles of an inner-city family living in a tiny low-income apartment. When college student Andre (Akeem Smith) returns to the cramped quarters of his deadbeat dad's (Winters) overstuffed apartment, hilarity ensues. Directed by Carl Gilliard, the colorful cast of this comical gem includes Veronica Thompson, Darius Dudley and Trisha Mann.
link.title: synopsis
My Big Phat Hip Hop Family
Don't Touch If You Ain't Prayed 2
Soul Theater Series: The Fabric of a Man
There's a Stranger in My House
A Good Day to Be Black & Sexy
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
Before the Devil Knows You're Dead

link.synopsis: In the male-dominated world of stand-up, these queens of comedy display their ample talent onstage and offer their keen insights offstage in this hilarious documentary. The talent roster is a who's who of funny women: Whoopi Goldberg, Ellen DeGeneres, Paula Poundstone, Phyllis Diller, Carol Burnett and more. Filmmaker Gail Singer also traces the roots of feminine humor with clips of Lucille Ball, Eve Arden and Mae West.
link.title: synopsis
Whoopi: Back on Broadway: The 20th Anniversary
Comic Relief: The Greatest... And the Latest
Rita Rudner: Live from Las Vegas
Spin City: Michael J. Fox: His All-Time Favorites: Vol. 1
Larry King Live: Greatest Interviews Collection
George Carlin: Jammin' in New York
George Carlin: What Am I Doing in New Jersey?
George Carlin: Playing with Your Head
George Carlin: You are All Diseased

link.synopsis: In this satiric Israeli comedy helmed by Ephraim Kishon, the man (Topol) who copped an Oscar for his performance in Fiddler on the Roof assays a very different role -- that of incorrigible idler Ervinka, who's determined to win the lottery. When the loot fails to come to him the traditional way, however, he masquerades as a movie director to rob the lottery office under the pretext of making a film … and even dupes the police into helping him.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: On an outing to the country, a doctor and his daughter stop in a town known for its organic beef. But the travelers run up against a mutated virus that turns people into the undead and hamburger patties into ravenous killers in this horror comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Children Shouldn't Play with Dead Things
Tales from the Crypt: Deadly Duo

link.synopsis: When a kidnapper mistakenly calls their line and demands a hefty ransom in exchange for the young girl he abducted (Baby Anju), three friends (Prabhu, Revathi and V.K. Ramaswamy) see an opportunity to change their dire financial situations in this 1990 Bollywood comedy. Their seemingly foolproof plan? They'll ask the girl's grandfather for double the ransom and keep half the money for themselves.
link.title: synopsis
Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
Oru Kaidhiyin Diary / Tik Tik Tik

link.synopsis: Fed up with their jobs as a joke store employee and a street cleaner, respectively, Ronnie (Joe Mullaney) and Will (Vincent Friell) don quirky costumes and transform themselves into bandits who specialize in robbing sightseeing buses. In the process of dodging the law, they inadvertently become national celebrities -- and one of the hottest tourist attractions in town. Ned Beatty also stars in director Michael Hoffman's outlandish comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Ealing Comedy Collection: Whisky Galore
Open All Hours: The Complete Series
Full Bottom: Not Another Half-Arsed Release
The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
The Man with One Red Shoe

link.synopsis: Struggling writer Chaloots (Karl Wiedergott) becomes involved in the tangled romantic lives of his childhood friend, arrogant agent Dominic (Spencer Garrett), and fellow scribe John (Michael Marich) when he realizes they're both dating Juliet (Samantha Smith), a studio script reader. When Juliet champions John's latest screenplay, the relationships become even more complex. This humorous Hollywood comedy co-stars Tripp Reed.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: William Hung, who shot to fame with an off-key audition on "American Idol," makes his film debut in this martial arts musical comedy. Auntie Foon (Nancy Sit), a music hall owner in Imperial China, searches for her long-lost son, as well as husbands for her 12 daughters. Enter kindly singer Ma (Hung), who could be Foon's son. The fun family film also features a priceless Chinese version of Hung singing his signature, Ricky Martin's "She Bangs."
link.title: synopsis
My Wife Is a Gambling Maestro
American Prophet: The Story of Joseph Smith
The History of American Railroads: Era of Diesel
Classic Educational Shorts: Vol. 2: How to be a Woman
Fists of Shaolin / Out of Danger
Shaolin vs. Evil Dead: Ultimate Power

link.synopsis: Grammy Award winner and country music star Jimmy Dean hosts this variety show, which was a hit for ABC television during the mid-1960s and a venue where many country music entertainers got their start. This collection of episodes from Dean's weekly show features some of the best comedy sketches and performances by Buck Owens, Charlie Rich, the Chuck Cassey Singers and Jim Henson, along with his Muppet Rowlf the Dog.
link.title: synopsis
The Best of The Johnny Cash TV Show: 1969-1971
The Adventures of Jim Bowie: The Complete Collection
Outside the Ropes Presents: Life in the Fast Lane
The George Burns & Gracie Allen Show
For Love of Liberty: The Story of America's Black Patriots
Open All Hours: The Complete Series
Best of the Jimmy Dean Show: Vol. 2
The Judy Garland Show: Featuring Mel Torme and Diahann Carroll
The Judy Garland Show: Featuring Ray Bolger and Vic Damone
The Dick Cavett Show: Comic Legends
The Best of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In 2
The Best of the Flip Wilson Show
The Dick Cavett Show: Rock Icons
Music Scene: The Best of 1969-1970: Vol. 2

The Judy Garland Show: Featuring Peggy Lee and Ethel Merman

Judy, Frank and Dean: Once in a Lifetime

Barbra Streisand: The Television Specials: Color Me Barbra
Barbra Streisand: The Television Specials: My Name Is Barbra
Barbra Streisand: The Television Specials: Belle of 14th Street
Barbra Streisand: The Television Specials: Barbra Streisand: Happening in Central Park
Soupy Sales: In Living Black & White
Elvis Presley: The Ed Sullivan Shows

title.regular: Best of the Jimmy Dean Show: Vol. 1
title.short: Best of the Jimmy Dean Show: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: A young man and woman meet when they each are registered with a marriage bureau by parents hoping to wed them to people abroad. But tempers fly when it's discovered that the agency is a scam. In the ensuing chaos, the young couple discovers a mutual attraction that eventually leads to love and marriage. Sukhjinder Shera directs this romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: G. Asrani directs and stars in this classic Bollywood musical comedy about a boy who finds superstardom and achieves his wildest dreams. A lively score by R.D. Burman includes the songs "Khoyee Ho Zubie-Zubie," "Teri Kat-Putlee Hoon Main," "Do Pal Ki Hai Zindagi," "Kya Soch Rahe Ho" and "Na Jaane Din Kaise." Bindiya Goswami, Premnath, Bindu and Ashok Kumar round out the film's ensemble cast.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In this satire of corporate America, it's business as usual at the vampire-owned and -operated Netherbeast Inc. -- one of the world's largest phone makers -- until the boss contracts vampire Alzheimer's and starts hiring humans. Bodies soon begin to pile up in this office comedy based on the award-winning short The Netherbeast of Berm-Tech Industries, Inc. Darrell Hammond, Judd Nelson, Dave Foley, Jason Mewes and Robert Wagner co-star.
link.title: synopsis
Monster X Strikes Back: Attack at the G8 Summit
The Last Lovecraft: Relic of Cthulhu
Zombies / The Blood Seekers / Blood Stalkers
Shaolin vs. Evil Dead: Ultimate Power

link.synopsis: Unlikely roommates Boyd (Dave Boyle) and Jerome (Jayson Watabe) harbor big dreams in this quirky comedy set in Japantown in San Jose, Calif. American Boyd wants to fit in with the local Japanese businessmen, while the average-sized, half-Japanese Jerome aspires to be a sumo wrestler. No one's interested in Boyd's "translation services," and Jerome can't get a wrestling match, but things begin to look up when they meet a woman named Mai (Rachel Morihiro).
link.title: synopsis
Inventing L.A.: The Chandlers and Their Times
UFC Classics: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Vol. 7

link.synopsis: Hoping to meet Mr. Right, black women wind up with some of the world's biggest losers in Jean Claude LaMarre's helpful dating guide. Framed around cautionary tales of women who manage to land Mr. Wrong, this cheeky comedy highlights dating no-no's. Fortunately, it also illuminates the way to finding that elusive good man. Garry Guerrier, Jakquelyn Scott, John Jean, Kristian Bernard Kelly and Malik Barnhardt co-star.
link.title: synopsis
Black Woman's Guide to Getting Married
Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live from South Beach
Soul Theater Series: The Fabric of a Man
Keepin' the Faith: Lookin' for Mr. Right
My Big Phat Hip Hop Family
A Good Man Is Hard to Find
I Think I Love My Wife
Tyler Perry's I Can Do Bad All by Myself

title.regular: Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man
title.short: Black Woman's Guide to Finding a Good Man

link.synopsis: When all-female punk band Las Sioux loses a member, they persuade virginal young Sara (Verónica Sánchez) to join them as they play at rowdy underground nightclub El Calentito. Soon, the music leads Sara into a debauched world of sex, anarchy and uninhibited revelry. Set during the period of Spain's shaky move toward democracy in the early 1980s, this raucous musical comedy co-stars Ruth Díaz and Macarena Gómez as the other band members.
link.title: synopsis
South Beach Academy / Rock 'n' Roll High School Forever
Chip Pirates: Los Corsarios del Chip

link.synopsis: People spend as much time with their cubicle neighbors as with their own families. This knowing comedy explores the lives of office workers Henry (Greg Korin) and Charlene (Ellen O'Brien), who love to poke fun at their colleagues; Laurie (Connie Sinavage), who sits next to weirdo Ted (Steve Stylinski); and arrogant new kid Barry (Jack Evans), who's having an affair with Lindsey (Jessica Chorey). Jason Sherry directs.
link.title: synopsis
The Good, the Bad and the Beautiful / The Bikini Academy
Glow Ropes: The Rise and Fall of a Bar Mitzvah Emcee
Dave Barry's Complete Guide to Guys

link.synopsis: Two Southern California surfer dudes, Don (Don Atkinson) and Donn (Donn Dunlop), head to Australia in pursuit of the perfect wave. Soaking in the splendor of the Land Down Under, they hunt with aborigines, rescue baby kangaroos and search for gold in the outback. Patrick Macnee co-stars in this comedy, part Endless Summer and part Crocodile Dundee, that showcases the natural splendor and the fascinating wildlife and people of Australia.
link.title: synopsis
1000 Places to See Before You Die: Collection 2
Tubular Swells / A Day in the Life of Wayne Lynch
1000 Places to See Before You Die: Collection 1
Divine Horsemen: The Living Gods of Haiti
Falasha: Exile of the Black Jews
Private Practices: The Story of a Sex Surrogate
War in the Pacific with Walter Cronkite
The Spencer Tracy Legacy: A Tribute by Katharine Hepburn
Art Pepper: Notes from a Jazz Survivor

link.synopsis: Screwball comedy meets political commentary when a young journalist falls for an attractive Shanghai factory worker in the acclaimed Chinese classic Crossroads. Then, in Daybreak, an innocent woman from a fishing village falls victim to the seedy underbelly of Shanghai while searching for her cousin. Directed by Xiling Shen, Crossroads stars Dan Zhao and Yang Bai; Li-li Li and Zhanfei Gao star in Daybreak, directed by Yu Sun.
link.title: synopsis
Myriad of Lights / Along the Sungari River
Outskirts / The Girl with the Hatbox
God of Gamblers III: Back to Shanghai
The Big Road / Queen of Sports
Empress Wu Zetian / Dream of the Red Chamber
My Song Goes Round the World

link.synopsis: Cutie Honey jumps from anime to live action in this full-throttle adventure comedy based on the classic manga character. When the evil Panther Claw gang steals the powerful I-System, pink-clad superheroine Cutie Honey (Eriko Sato) steps in to save the universe. Hideaki Anno directs and co-writes this outrageously fun fantasy that also starts Mikako Ichikawa, Jun Murakami, Eisuke Sakai and Hairi Katagiri.
link.title: synopsis
Attack Girls' Swim Team vs. the Undead
Karaoke Terror: The Complete Japanese Showa Songbook
When the Last Sword Is Drawn
Requiem for a Bodyguard: Vol. 4: Gun Crazy
Bounty Hunter Vixens: Treasure of Lust

link.synopsis: Country superstar Barbara Mandrell -- along with her sisters Louise and Irlene -- hosts this immensely popular variety series from the 1980s. Blending a heapin' helpin' of sketch comedy with an even bigger serving of country music, this best-of collection features performances by Johnny Cash, Marty Robbins, Kenny Rogers, Dolly Parton, the Statler Brothers, Ray Charles, Glen Campbell, Bob Hope and Andy Kaufman.
link.title: synopsis
Best of Barbara Mandrell & the Mandrell Sisters Show: Disc 1
Best of Barbara Mandrell & the Mandrell Sisters Show: Disc 2
The Best of The Johnny Cash TV Show: 1969-1971
Smothers Brothers Comedy Hour: The Best of Season 3
The Best of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In 2
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
Dean Martin: The One and Only

Tony Orlando & Dawn: The Ultimate Collection
The Dame Edna Experience: The Christmas Specials

The Dick Cavett Show: Hollywood Greats

The Best of Donny & Marie: Vols. 1 & 2
The Hudson Brothers Razzle Dazzle Show: The Complete Series
Barbra Streisand: The Television Specials: Barbra Streisand... and Other Musical Instruments
Mitzi Gaynor: Razzle Dazzle! The Special Years

title.regular: Best of Barbara Mandrell & the Mandrell Sisters Show

link.synopsis: Nothing much ever happens to shy Yoshiro, until one day when he brings home a stray kitten. The next morning, Yoshiro awakens to discover that the kitten has become a beautiful woman named Kiki. She may be the girl of Yoshiro's dreams, but how will he deal with her nasty habit of scratching the furniture? This nerd-meets-girl comedy is the second film in the Akihabara Trilogy, following The Legend of the Doll and preceding Pretty Maid Café.
link.title: synopsis
5 Dolls for an August Moon / Four Times That Night
20th Century Boys: Chapter 2: The Last Hope
Shameless, Tasteless: Trash Cinema from the Soviet Underground
Twilight of the Ice Nymphs / Archangel
Dresden Dolls: Live at the Roundhouse London
Van Halen Live: Right Here, Right Now
Monster X Strikes Back: Attack at the G8 Summit
Warm Water Under a Red Bridge
The Last Days of the World
Genghis Khan: To the Ends of the Earth and Sea

link.synopsis: In this romantic comedy from Jing Wong, a tycoon goes incognito and finds love in a life very different from his own. After chance leads Lone Ka-Chun (Andy Lau) to take a job at a grocery store, he falls in love with the store owner's daughter, Moon (Man Cheung). But his bliss will be short-lived. As shifty business schemes threaten Ka-Chun's Dragon Enterprises and Moon's family store, he must return to his high-powered life to stop the shysters.
link.title: synopsis
God of Gamblers III: Back to Shanghai

link.synopsis: Hapless hatcheck clerk Louis Blore (Red Skelton) downs a spiked cocktail and awakens in 17th-century France as King Louis XV. There, he woos the charming Madame Du Barry (Lucille Ball), who bears an uncanny resemblance to May Daly, his crush in the real world. Gene Kelly and Virginia O'Brien co-star in this infectious musical comedy that features the classic songs "Friendship," "You Are My Sunshine" and "I'm Getting Sentimental over You."
link.title: synopsis
Take Me Out to the Ball Game
I Love Lucy: The Movie and Other Great Rarities

link.synopsis: Theater-loving Rodney Miller (Ash Christian) may not hang with the high school A-crowd, but then again, he doesn't really want to. Along with his best pal, the supersized Sabrina (Ashley Fink), Rodney embarks on a series of adventures that bring both romance and inspiration. Christian wrote, directed and stars in this coming-of-age tale indie comedy about a gay teenager struggling to find his place in a small-town Texas high school.
link.title: synopsis
Everything You Wanted to Know About Gay Porn Stars
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green

link.synopsis: The outrageous comedy of Kenneth Keith Kallenbach, a "Howard Stern Show" Wack Pack alum, is showcased in this collection of his most entertaining skits and pranks. Featured are never-before-seen sketches and shorts from early in Kallenbach's 20-year career, as well as his uproarious stand-up routine. Listen in on his crazy phony phone calls and to his musical project, the Kenneth Keith Kallenbach Band.
link.title: synopsis
Pornography: The Secret History of Civilization
Otto; or, Up With Dead People
Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day
Spike & Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation: Caught in the Act
Spike & Mike's Sick & Twisted Festival of Animation: Contagious
Harold and Kumar Go to White Castle
Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
Spike & Mike's Classic Festival of Animation

link.synopsis: Reluctant to marry and leave her widowed mother, Akiko Miwa (Setsuko Hara), all alone, a dutiful daughter (Yôko Tsukasa) resists selecting a suitor. But her late father's friends, who are eager to see both women happy, insist on stepping in to play matchmaker. Acclaimed director Yasujiro Ozu explores the flipside of the traditional mother-daughter bond in this touching family comedy set in postwar Japan.
link.title: synopsis
Late Ozu: The End of Summer
When a Woman Ascends the Stairs
Samurai Trilogy 3: Duel at Ganryu Island
A Year of the Quiet Sun

link.synopsis: In this hit comedy that aired from 1957 to 1963, the McCoy family moves from the mountains of West Virginia to a ranch in California's San Fernando Valley. Crotchety Grandpa Amos (Walter Brennan) leads the clan, which consists of his grandson Luke (Richard Crenna), Luke's wife, Kate (Kathleen Nolan), and Luke's young siblings (Lydia Reed and Michael Winkelman). With heartwarming humor, the rural family tries its best to fit into California life.
link.title: synopsis
The Life of Riley / Our Miss Brooks
Sgt. Bilko: The Phil Silvers Show: Season 1
The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet: Vol. 9
The Loretta Young Show: Christina's Children Series
The Jack Benny Show: Collector's Edition
The Golden Age of TV Comedy
The I Love Lucy 50th Anniversary Special
Project XX: End of the Trail
One Day at a Time: Season 1
I Love Lucy: Lucy's Really Lost Moments
The Funny Blokes of British Comedy
Not On Your Nellie: The Complete First Series

link.synopsis: On the eve of Passover, shy Santiago (Fernando Rubio) is reunited with his cousin and childhood sweetheart, Luciana (Luna Paiva), in Buenos Aires. When grumpy patriarch Mauricio (Puerto Rican screen veteran Axel Anderson) has a near-death experience, Luciana decides to prepare the Seder meal herself. Director Gabriel Lichtmann explores themes of ethnic identity and family values in this warmhearted comedy drama from Argentina.
link.title: synopsis
Harlan: In the Shadow of Jew Süss
No Dejare Que No Me Quieras

link.synopsis: A con man (Piotr Fronczewski) gets out of jail and is soon up to his old tricks. He starts small, but his grifts quickly grow more elaborate and far-reaching, until he's entangled all manner of local politicians and government ministers in his chicanery, culminating with his grand impersonation of an Austrian diplomat. Miroslaw Bork's dry-witted Polish comedy won the Best Director award at the San Sebastian International Film Festival in 1989.
link.title: synopsis
On the Banks of the Niemen
Between the Cup and the Lip
Superproduction: Behind the Scenes of Scandal
A Year of the Quiet Sun
Psy II / Pigs II: The Last Blood

link.synopsis: Blending zany comedy with sizzling action sequences, Madam City Hunter stars martial arts maven Cynthia Khan as top-notch police detective Yang Ching, who finds her job -- and life -- on the line after she's framed for the murder of five drug addicts. Determined to bring the real culprits -- a gang known as the Five Fingers Mob -- to justice, Yang teams with a private eye (called Charlie Chan, no less) and sets out to clear her good name.
link.title: synopsis
Sword Masters: Journey of the Doomed
Outside the Ropes Presents: Life in the Fast Lane
A Sword Named Revenge / The Dream Sword
Hard Revenge, Milly / Hard Revenge, Milly: Bloody Battle

link.synopsis: In the Buenenrostros family, the women are in charge. Facing life in their Mexico City apartment complex with romance and laughter, along with a little death, they interrupt their clandestine business deals only for the occasional love triangle. It's a good thing the neighbors are on their side. Pilar Ixquic Mata, Lumi Cavazos, Marta Zamora and Jesús Ochoa star in this wickedly dark comedy from director Busi Cortés.
link.title: synopsis
Entre La Tarde y La Noche
Wait for Me in Another World

title.regular: A Good Death Beats a Dull Life
title.short: A Good Death Beats a Dull Life

link.synopsis: Roger, Dwayne and Rerun, the fun-loving teens from the popular mid-1970s comedy "What's Happening," are back for more laughs in this sequel series that picks up seven years later. Now adults, newlywed Roger is a struggling writer, while his two buddies, still bachelors, are sharing an apartment. Dwayne is now a computer programmer, and Rerun, always the clown of the group, has found his niche as a used car salesman.
link.title: synopsis
Little House on the Prairie: The Pilot

link.synopsis: When members of the Boone family travel from far and wide to Iowa for a family reunion, spirits are high -- and so is the level of dysfunction. Vivacious 8-year-old Ruby (Katie Hermanson) acts as ambassador between relatives, settling disagreements and reminding everyone that, at the end of the day, they're family. Written and directed by Mas Gardner, this rollicking comedy also stars Marge Armstrong, Marc Beltrame and Stephanie Brown.
link.title: synopsis
The Laramie Kid / Single Handed Saunders
Agatha Christie's Tommy & Tuppence: Partners in Crime
Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
The Best of Abbott and Costello: Vol. 4
Mom and Dad Save the World
The Best of Abbott and Costello: Vol. 3
The Bad News Bears Go to Japan!
The Bad News Bears in Breaking Training

link.synopsis: When his estranged sister becomes ill, millionaire rap star P Miller (Master P) unexpectedly becomes the reluctant guardian of her three children. The kids aren't thrilled about having a baby sitter, but their attitude changes when they find out who their famous uncle is. Master P's real-life son Romeo, Cheech Marin and Ella Joyce co-star in this family comedy, the debut feature by music video director Bernard Gourley.
link.title: synopsis
VeggieTales: Silly Little Thing Called Love

link.synopsis: Terminally dateless, Ed, Vig and Seth devise a scheme to meet beautiful women: They hold auditions for a film project that doesn't exist. But as the make-believe movie directors conduct casting calls for the women of their dreams, they unexpectedly find themselves falling for "cast members." Are they man enough to face the consequences of their deception? Jeff Farber, Marc Krinsky and Tom Lawrence star in this engaging comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Ah My Buddha: Vol. 1: The Aroused One
How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story
A Film with Me in It
Glick Doesn't Do Red Carpet: Jiminy Glick at the Independent Spirit Awards

link.synopsis: When his gorgeous girlfriend breaks his heart, good guy Steven Goodson (Fred Savage) turns to the dark side and sets out to sleep with as many women as possible. But when he meets a beautiful schoolteacher who insists on taking it slow, Steven must learn to keep his libido in check and connect on a deeper level. Directed by Jonathan Segal, this charming romantic comedy also stars Amy Adams (Junebug) and Steven Pasquale (TV's "Rescue Me").
link.title: synopsis
National Lampoon Presents Jake's Booty Call
How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog

link.synopsis: Surreal and grotesque, this black comedy spanning three generations of men serves as an absurdist journey through the history of Hungary, from World War II through the communist era to the present. In postwar Hungary, a depraved hospital orderly spawns an outrageously obese son, Kalman (Gergely Trócsányi), who in turn goes on to raise his own progeny, a skinny boy (Marc Bischoff) freakishly obsessed with taxidermy.
link.title: synopsis
Youssou N'Dour: I Bring What I Love
Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call New Orleans
Vermilion Pleasure Night: Vol. 1: Optic Erotica

link.synopsis: An irreverent troupe of white boys (and girls) unleashes its collective wit on urban audiences in this hilarious Showtime stand-up series that seeks to prove comedy is colorless. Featured personalities include veteran comic Joey Kola, Southern-style comedienne Jen Kober and New York funnyman Rich Vos, who found a national audience as one of the contestants on "Last Comic Standing."
link.title: synopsis
White Boyz in the Hood: Season 1: Disc 1
White Boyz in the Hood: Season 1: Disc 2
The Best of Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen
UFC: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Ultimate Knockouts 7
Race to Freedom: The Story of the Underground Railroad
Secret Diary of a Call Girl
The Big Black Comedy Show: Vol. 2
Inside the Actors Studio: Leading Men
Ghost Hunters: Live from the Waverly Sanatorium
Shaq & Cedric the Entertainer Present: All Star Comedy Jam
The Second City: The First Family of Comedy
The Funny Blokes of British Comedy
The Best of So Graham Norton
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Prince of Space
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Saturday TV Funhouse
I Love Lucy: Lucy's Really Lost Moments

link.synopsis: This bittersweet comedy sees two women with loved ones to bury join forces in a struggle against cemetery politics. The story revolves around Miryam (Miryam Zohar), who goes against tradition by demanding to be buried next to her disgraced husband, and Ana (Ania Bukstein), who must honor her deceased father's wishes by proving that he was Jewish. Directed by Shmuel and Amir Hasfari, this multilayered Israeli treat co-stars Yehuda Levi.
link.title: synopsis
Turn Left at the End of the World

link.synopsis: Hoping to cash in on an American-made car, Israeli auto dealers Shmuel (Avi Kushnir) and Siso (Moshe Ivgy) hit the road for Germany. The pair heads out in the metallic-blue Lincoln limousine that they hope will turn a profit in Deutschland, but the adventure is fraught with roadblocks and clouded with the indelible events of darker times. Dan Verete directs this provocative award-winning Israeli comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Turn Left at the End of the World

link.synopsis: After his mother remarries, 12-year-old Ricky Stratton (Rick Schroder) moves in with his wealthy father, Edward (Joel Higgins), in the debut season of the family-friendly comedy. The series kicks off with father and son getting to know each other as kid-at-heart Edward tries to be a responsible father without spoiling Ricky. Season 1 finds the pair in misadventures involving bullies, girls, custody battles and lost orangutans, just to name a few.
link.title: synopsis
One Day at a Time: Season 1
Not On Your Nellie: The Complete First Series

link.synopsis: The humdrum life of Maurice (Matthias Van Khache), a farm boy in the south of France, is shattered when a beautiful Parisian girl strays into his sleepy town. Immediately smitten with her, Maurice follows her to Paris where he encounters a world he never dreamed of. Will Maurice's naïveté win the girl over, or will the sophisticated city be his undoing? This trendy teen comedy also stars Richard Bohringer, Ticky Holgado and Elise Perrier.
link.title: synopsis
Them and Me / The Sky in a Garden
I Do: How to Get Married and Stay Single
How Much Do You Love Me?

link.synopsis: Aptly named unscrupulous politician Alan B'Stard (Rik Mayall) goes to extremes to gain power and money in this late 1980s BBC comedy series. B'Stard cheats on his wife (Marsha Fitzalan), annihilates his rivals (literally) and harasses his staff as he claws his way to the top. This set includes the entire 26-episode series and the feature-length "Who Shot Alan B'Stard" -- Britain's version of the popular "Dallas" cliff-hanger "Who Shot J.R.?"
link.title: synopsis
Full Bottom: Not Another Half-Arsed Release
The Thin Blue Line: The Complete Lineup
A Bit of Fry and Laurie
Doctor Who: The Trial of a Time Lord
Doctor Who: The Mark of the Rani
The Dame Edna Experience: The Christmas Specials

link.synopsis: Upon graduating from high school, Walter (Eric Fagundes) receives a cell phone that could solve all his problems: It comes with a personal genie that can control anyone, including Walter's protective parents, pesky brother and sexy neighbors. With such incredible powers at his disposal, Walter sets out to make his wildest dreams come true in this sequel to the 2001 comedy Pretty Cool. Rolfe Kanefsky writes and directs.
link.title: synopsis
Rod Steele 0014: You Only Live Until You Die
The Night of the White Pants
The Boys and Girls Guide to Getting Down

link.synopsis: While working in West Berlin, Finnish cabdriver Alex (Kari Väänänen) finds himself mixed up with the mob in director Mika Kaurismäki's noir-tinged comedy. With two corpses and a briefcase full of dead presidents in the backseat, Alex has his hands full -- especially with a crime kingpin (Samuel Fuller) and his henchman in pursuit as the hapless cabbie tries to dump the bodies. Eddie Constantine and Jean-Pierre Castaldi also star.
link.title: synopsis
Tigrero: A Film That Was Never Made
Warriors of the Wasteland / Cosmos: War of the Planets
The Sacrifice / Directed by Andrei Tarkovsky

link.synopsis: A Russian woman (Yelena Panova) accepts a job as a prostitute so she can live in Switzerland -- a country she's obsessed with. But when her employers (Geraldine Chaplin and Ulrich Noethen) try to send her back home, she stirs up a scandal by exposing their sexy venture and upper-class clientele. Her whistle-blowing throws genteel Switzerland into political and social upheaval in director Daniel Schmid's dark comedy. Martin Benrath co-stars.
link.title: synopsis
Passport to Europe: Germany, Switzerland & Austria
The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin: The Complete Series
Once Upon a Time in Mexico

title.regular: Beresina oder Die letzten Tage der Schweiz
title.short: Beresina oder Die letzten Tage der Schweiz

link.synopsis: After witnessing a murder, a teenage skateboarder becomes the target of a merciless gang. The thugs chase the boy all over town in an attempt to silence him forever, but somehow he keeps dodging their increasingly ridiculous schemes. Starring Roberto Trujillo, Nelly Godoy and Hernán Casariego, Leopoldo Laborde's comedy gives a nod to filmmaker Juan Orol (the Ed Wood of Mexican film).
link.title: synopsis
Top Fighter / Super Power / Call Me Dragon / My Life Is on the Line
The Last House on the Beach
Kino: The Legend of the Black Priest

link.synopsis: When night falls, bored 33-year-old El Cid (Damian Young) takes to the Manhattan streets with the Asphalt Nomads, a group of lonely dreamers who cruise New York in big cars until dawn. Art Jones' comedy drama was a film festival hit. The quirky indie was nominated for Best Feature at the Cinequest San Jose Film Festival and for the Golden Starfish Award at the Hamptons International Film Festival.
link.title: synopsis
Science Is Fiction: 23 Films by Jean Painlevé
The Giant Claw / The Creature from the Atom Brain

link.synopsis: With a sizable inheritance at stake, members of a large extended family hatch a plot to murder two of their own -- happily married couple Mercedes (Lorena Velasquez) and Roque (Antonio Espino). As greed gives way to insanity -- and eventually to slapstick comedy -- can this husband-and-wife team keep their wits about them?
link.title: synopsis
Coleccion Pedro Infante: La Oveja Negra
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Las Islas Marias
Coleccion Pedro Infante: La Mujer Que Yo Perdi

link.synopsis: Comedy and action collide in this Spanish-language caper about an unconventional gang of delinquent thieves (including Gibrán Gonzáles and Alan Ciangherotti) whose crime operation is anything but organized. Among them are a drug addict, a schizophrenic and one seriously overweight thug who manage to take incompetence to unprecedented lows.
link.title: synopsis
La Muerte del Gallo de Oro
Si Honraras a Tu Coca Madre
Dios te Bendiga Hijo Mío: Santa Martha Acatitla Penitenciaria

link.synopsis: While other kids are out playing, 8-year-old Willie (Marc Gilpin) is usually occupied with loftier pursuits -- say, designing a bionic rabbit or programming a minicomputer. But when his latest invention goes awry, Willie needs more than just his brains to set things right, as his remote control -- which controls &NFi;everything&NFi_; (including the town's power supply) -- goes berserk in this comedy co-starring Henry Darrow and Katherine Woodville.
link.title: synopsis
Mooch Goes to Hollywood / Poco, Little Dog Lost / My Dog Shep / Rin Tin Tin and the Test
The Strongest Man in the World
The Last Flight of Noah's Ark
The Horse in the Gray Flannel Suit
The One and Only, Genuine, Original Family Band
The Care Bears Movie II: A New Generation
Rainbow Brite and the Star Stealer
Adventures of the Gummi Bears: Vol. 1: Seasons 1-3
You're A Good Man, Charlie Brown
The Apple Dumpling Gang Rides Again

link.synopsis: Judy Davis makes her big-screen debut in this Australian action comedy about a pair of carny workers (Joseph Bottoms, Grigor Taylor) who hit the road looking for adventure -- and find it in spades when they hitch a ride from a man in a green Corvette. When the driver hits on one of the guys, the two beat him senseless and steal his wallet and car -- only to discover that the car is loaded with drugs and the wallet filled with cash.
link.title: synopsis
The Beast Within / The Bat People
The Tomorrow Show with Tom Snyder: Punk & New Wave
Star of David: Hunting for Beautiful Girls
Harry and Walter Go to New York
How to Beat the High Cost of Living
The Man Who Would Be King

title.regular: High Rolling in a Hot Corvette
title.short: High Rolling in a Hot Corvette

link.synopsis: Legendary Hollywood paramours Mary Pickford and Douglas Fairbanks make their only joint film appearance in this early talkie adaptation of William Shakespeare's classic comedy of the sexes. Pickford plays the sharp-tongued Katherine, and Fairbanks assays the role of the lothario Petruchio in this broadly satiric version of the Bard's tale co-starring Edwin Maxwell and Dorothy Jordan and directed by Sam Taylor.
link.title: synopsis
The Private Life of Don Juan
Shakespeare Comedies: The Taming of the Shrew
Mary Pickford: A Life on Film
Why Be Good?: Sexuality & Censorship in Early Cinema
If You Could Only Cook / Too Many Husbands
The Mark of Zorro / Don Q: Son of Zorro
The Big Broadcast of 1938 / College Swing
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 3
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2

link.synopsis: Buddies Juan Carlos (David Tenreiro) and Alboroto (Juan Díaz) have big plans for the apartment they've obtained from a relative for free. But their scheme to earn money renting out rooms quickly devolves into a chaotic mess in this hilarious comedy. Communal living's not all it's cracked up to be as the roommates deal with romantic escapades, chronic hangovers and piles of laundry, dishes and resentments. Diana Palazón and Iñaki Esnaola co-star.
link.title: synopsis
Coleccion Pedro Infante: ¿Que Te Ha Dado Esa Mujer?
The Other Side of the Bed
Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
Todo El Poder / La Ley de Herodes

link.synopsis: Navy Lt. Kingslee (Peter Lawford) is the technical adviser on actress Rosalind Reynolds's (Esther Williams) new movie. He holds fond memories of a show she did for the troops and hopes she'll fall in love with him. But Ros's current co-star  (Ricardo Montalban) is her beau on and off the set. Jimmy Durante, Cyd Charisse and Xavier Cugat provide able backup in this bubbly musical comedy from director Richard Thorpe.
link.title: synopsis
Take Me Out to the Ball Game
Rhythm on the Range / Rhythm on the River: Double Feature
The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend
How to Stuff a Wild Bikini

link.synopsis: Wealthy heiress Connie Allenbury (Esther Williams) is suing the Morning Star for libel. Hoping to save his job, newsman Warren Haggerty (Keenan Wynn) recruits his fiancée (Lucille Ball) and a handsome playboy (Van Johnson) to trap Connie into a compromising situation. Complications and romantic entanglements follow in director Edward Buzzell's hilarious musical comedy remake of Libeled Lady.
link.title: synopsis
Take Me Out to the Ball Game
By the Light of the Silvery Moon

link.synopsis: When Wendy Shuman (Kelly Maguire) returns to Los Angeles after a year away at a New York college, family shenanigans mark her homecoming in this wacky coming-of-age comedy set over the course of one zany day. As the family attempts to leave home to attend a birthday party, events conspire to keep them from departing. Directed by Gretchen Somerfeld, Interruptions stars Harry Cohn, Grace McClure, Kirk B.R. Woller and Beth Grant.
link.title: synopsis
Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
